thread.title: Very nice hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel, great location - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kai0288
title: Very nice hotel, great location
text:
This hotel is located really close to the new WTC and the Wall Street. It's only a few steps away from the subway and you'll be uptown or in Brooklyn in no time. Great location. The hotel itself has around 50 floors and is pretty clean. Staff is super friendly and rooms are defiantly big enough for two. I can only recommend. Next time in NYC, this is where I'll stay.
Room Tip: the higher the better See more room tips
